channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-3594|2024-05-23T06:00:02.724Z -- Unknown -- IDonate
item.description: The IDonate WordPress plugin through 1.9.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-3920|2024-05-23T06:00:03.279Z -- Unknown -- Flattr
item.description: The Flattr WordPress plugin through 1.2.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-3917|2024-05-23T06:00:02.910Z -- Unknown -- Pet Manager
item.description: The Pet Manager WordPress plugin through 1.4 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin

item.title: CVE-2024-3918|2024-05-23T06:00:03.093Z -- Unknown -- Pet Manager
item.description: The Pet Manager WordPress plugin through 1.4 does not sanitise and escape some of its Pet settings, which could allow high privilege users such as Contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-4399|2024-05-23T06:00:03.650Z -- Unknown -- cas
item.description: The does not validate a parameter before making a request to it, which could allow unauthenticated users to perform SSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2024-2220|2024-05-23T06:00:02.518Z -- Unknown -- Button contact VR
item.description: The Button contact VR WordPress plugin through 4.7 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-4388|2024-05-23T06:00:03.466Z -- Unknown -- cas
item.description: This does not validate a path generated with user input when downloading files, allowing unauthenticated user to download arbitrary files from the server
